search.query: | inputlookup eiq_entities_list | dedup feed_id | table feed_id
| inputlookup eiq_entities_list | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | search meta_tags!="" | mvexpand meta_tags | dedup meta_tags | table meta_tags

panel.title: Total Count of Observables in Splunk

search.query: | inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | stats distinct_count(id_eiq)

| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids | join entity_id type=left max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | eval obs_id=id_eiq] | addinfo | eval timestamp_eiq=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where timestamp_eiq>= info_min_time and timestamp_eiq<= info_max_time | stats distinct_count(obs_id) as observables by feed_id | append [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | eval timestamp_eiq=strptime(last_updated_at, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | addinfo | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where timestamp_eiq>= info_min_time and timestamp_eiq<= info_max_time | stats distinct_count(entity_id) as entities by feed_id] |stats sum(observables) as observables sum(entities) as entities by feed_id

format.colorPalette: {"N/A - this feed isn't mentioned in settings":#F8BE34}
{"N/A - this feed isn't mentioned in settings":#F8BE34}

search.query: | inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | timechart distinct_count(id_eiq) by feed_id

panel.title: Downloaded Observables by Time and Type

search.query: | inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | timechart distinct_count(id_eiq) by type_eiq

| inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | stats distinct_count(id_eiq) as "count" by type_eiq | sort - count

| inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | stats distinct_count(id_eiq) as "count" by type_eiq | sort - count | rename type_eiq as "Observable-Type" count as Count

| inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq,meta_tags ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | eval meta_tags=case(meta_tags!="",meta_tags,1=1,"N/A") | stats distinct_count(id_eiq) as "count" by meta_tags | sort - count

| inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq,meta_tags ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | eval meta_tags=case(meta_tags!="",meta_tags,1=1,"N/A") | stats distinct_count(id_eiq) as "count" by meta_tags | sort - count | rename meta_tags AS "Tags"

| inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq,confidence_eiq ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | stats distinct_count(id_eiq) as "count" by confidence_eiq | sort - count

| inputlookup eiq_ioc_list | eval entity_id=trim(split(entity_id,",")) | mvexpand entity_id | join entity_id type=inner max=0 [| inputlookup eiq_entities_list where $feed_token$ | eval observable_ids=trim(split(observable_ids,",")) | mvexpand observable_ids | eval meta_tags= trim(split(meta_tags,",")) | mvexpand meta_tags | search $token_meta$ | eval entity_id = _key | table feed_id ,entity_id,observable_ids,id_eiq,confidence_eiq ] | addinfo | eval _time=strptime(last_updated_at_eiq, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%6N%:z") | eval info_max_time= case(info_max_time="+Infinity",strftime(now(),"%s"),1=1,info_max_time) | where _time>= info_min_time and _time<= info_max_time | stats distinct_count(id_eiq) as "count" by confidence_eiq | eval confidence_eiq=case(confidence_eiq!="",confidence_eiq,1=1,"N/A") | sort - count | rename confidence_eiq AS Confidence
